Title: REGEXP
Description: 使用正则表达式匹配模式
Examples:
WITH vals AS (
    SELECT 'TiDB' AS v 
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 'Titanium'
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 'Tungsten'
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 'Rust'
)
SELECT 
    v,
    v REGEXP '^Ti' AS 'starts with "Ti"',
    v REGEXP '^.{4}$' AS 'Length is 4 characters'
FROM
    vals;
SELECT
    v
FROM (
        SELECT 'TiDB' AS v
    ) AS vals
WHERE
    v REGEXP 'DB$';
